3) Stop watching your download speed.  It's going to jump around like crazy with this many connections.  One minute you'll be downloading at 5kB/s, the next you'll be downloading at 1MB/s.  If it never does, then you're probably not connectable, and you need to read about port forwarding properly.

@souly420:

The idea that pirating games hurts sales is BS.
Most people who never buy games after pirating them would never have bought them in the first place, and some of us DO buy the games (to support the developers) after we've tried them out.

Used game sales DO take away from developers' sales, because the devs never see a dime from used sales. Used game stores make millions every year. You want to support game companies? Stop buying used games, and only buy new ones.
